prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a round body and cheerful expression.
Show me a Pokemon that loves to play in the wetlands and has a blue color scheme.
Imagine a cute, amphibious creature that enjoys lounging by the riverbank.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a friendly, oversized amphibian with a laid-back attitude.
Design a Pokemon that can thrive in both water and land environments, featuring blue and purple accents.
Give me a quirky Pokemon that stands out with its unique body shape and aquatic features.
Make a Pokemon that embodies joy and playfulness, perfect for a water-themed team.

distinctive_features: Prominent fin-like structures on the back
